TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnrollmentGroupsClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Subclient of that handles all enrollment group operations including getting/creating/setting/deleting enrollment groups, querying enrollment groups, and getting attestation mechanisms for particular enrollment groups.

Docs.param: The enrollment group to create or update.
Docs.summary: Create or update an enrollment group.
Docs.returns: The created or updated enrollment group.
Docs.remarks: This API creates a new enrollment group or update a existed one. All enrollment group in the Device Provisioning Service contains a unique identifier called enrollmentGroupId. If this API is called with an enrollmentGroupId that already exists, it will replace the existed enrollment group information by the new one. On the other hand, if the enrollmentGroupId does not exit, it will be created.
Docs.exception: If the service was not able to create or update the enrollment.
If the provided is null.
If the service was not able to create or update the enrollment.
If the provided has requested cancellation.

Docs.param: The with the SQL query. It cannot be null.
The int with the maximum number of items per iteration. It can be 0 for default, but not negative.
Docs.returns: The iterable set of query results.
Docs.remarks:
The service expects a SQL-like query such as
"SELECT * FROM enrollments".
For each iteration, the query will return a page of results. The maximum number of items per page can be specified by the pageSize parameter.
Docs.exception: If the provided is null.
If the provided is empty or white space.
If the provided value is less than zero.
If the provided has requested cancellation.

Docs.param: The that defines the single operation to do over the enrollment group. It cannot be null.
The collection of that contains the description of each enrollment group. It cannot be null or empty.
Docs.summary: Create, update or delete a set of enrollment groups.
Docs.returns: An object with the result of each operation.
Docs.remarks: This API provide the means to do a single operation over multiple enrollment groups. A valid operation is determined by , and can be 'create', 'update', 'updateIfMatchETag', or 'delete'.
Docs.exception: If the client failed to send the request or service was not able to execute the bulk operation.
